rows.label: qev060105_MSG0001
rows.name:
Er, hello? Are you the human delivering this shipment to
Shiraton?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0002
rows.name:
I am very very glad to see you.
Things are a bit...interesting right now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0003
rows.name:
See, I was developing a new weapon, but I accidentally
wound up with an extra-lethal poison bomb.
...Chemistry, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0004
rows.name:
I have no use for it, but it's not really the sort of thing
I can just put out with the recycling, you know?
I really was in in in quite the bind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0005
rows.name:
Life is so much easier since Shiraton and his friends
started collecting this stuff, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_SEL0011
rows.name:
Inquire as to why Pfeffen isn't selling
his bomb if it's so powerful.

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0006
rows.name:
That is the same question Roselle asked me, didn't she?
Er, do you know her? Roselle the BLADE operative?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0007
rows.name:
She asked if I would let her sell it to people,
which seems a a a bit...odd, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0008
rows.name:
But but Ma-non technology is clean, you know?
We have no use for anything that nasty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0009
rows.name:
I will be careful never to make anything like it again,
even by accident. I'm just trusting that you'll make sure
it's destroyed. ...You will do that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0010
rows.name: You humans seem so interested in the Zaruboggan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0011
rows.name:
A woman named Roselle asked me all about them a
little while ago, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I sent her on her way. I think maybe it's best if
curious humans get answers directly from the source?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0013
rows.name:
In any case, please ask Shiraton to to to destroy this
bomb for me, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060105_MSG0014
rows.name:
Here you go. I'm so so grateful.
So, er, see you around, perhaps?[ST:wait ]
